Sales Leaders Turned Recruiters

We are former B2B sales leaders with over 30 years of combined experience, and we know what it takes to build exceptionally successful sales teams and ensure new hires have the best opportunity to ramp quickly and contribute. And because we know the pain of endlessly sifting through resumes from employment agencies focused only on volume and credential hunting, we are on a mission to forever change the way organizations align with external recruiters.

The future work economy is here…requiring forward-thinking companies to look beyond the limitations of geography, demographics, or experience listed on a resume and discover the new generation of human capital ready to get to work.
